description: Synchronize products from Shopify to database. Fetches products from Shopify API, stores them in the products table, and returns count of synced products with status summary

category.description: Filter products by category (optional). If provided, only syncs products matching this category

status.description: Filter products by status (optional). Default is 'active'

limit.description: Maximum number of products to sync. Defaults to 50, max 250

force_refresh.description: If true, bypass cache and force refresh from Shopify
